categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Moorja system was home to the planet Moorja, and part of the Mid Rim. In 4 ABY, Platt Okeefe and the Black Curs fled to the planet to escape the competing forces of Moff Utoxx Prentioch and Imperial Advisor Bregius Golthan. A group of New Republic Intelligence operatives were able to make planetfall and aid the Black Curs to escape the Imperial attention.
Black Curs Blues gave this system's location as the Inner Rim, but the later source CIS Shadowfeed Dispatch 15:3:21 Edition placed Moorja in the Mid Rim.
